thread.title: Sock to play Berdych in Stockholm Open final
thread.title_full: Sock to play Berdych in Stockholm Open final

author: How a fight turned into a horror for a promising young boxer
title: Sock to play Berdych in Stockholm Open final
text:
Sock to play Berdych in Stockholm Open final Associated Press 19 hrs ago Â© Reuters Jack Sock serves to Richard Gasque during their Stockholm Open men's singles semifinal match. STOCKHOLM (AP) -- American Jack Sock reached his second ATP tour final of the season Saturday by beating second-seeded Richard Gasquet of France 6-4, 6-2 at the Stockholm Open.
AdChoices He will play defending champion Tomas Berdych in Sunday's final, after the top-seeded Czech player advanced when Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus retired with a right groin injury after losing the first set 6-1 in the other semifinal.
Berdych is looking for his third title in Stockholm and second of the year after winning in Shenzhen last month.
Sock broke Gasquet four times and hit 11 aces to wrap up the win in 1 hour, 22 minutes.
Sock said, ''I was able to stay on him and dictate a lot of the points. I was able to get a rhythm at the end and close it out comfortably.''
